info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 06 at 5:28PM EDT until April 06 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF BERKELEY COUNTY... At 528 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Old Santee Canal State Park, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include: Moncks Corner and Huger. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
